snippet: Under fire over accusations of police brutality, Mexico City’s police chief, Jesús Rodríguez Almeida, resigned on Friday.
abstract: Jesus Rodriguez Almeida, Mexico City's police chief, under fire for alleged police brutality, resigns.
lead_paragraph: Under fire over accusations of police brutality, Mexico City’s police chief, Jesús Rodríguez Almeida, resigned on Friday.

headline.main: Mexico: Police Chief Says He Is Stepping Down
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Police Chief in Capital Is Stepping Down
